==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Taher:''' Is doing business really all that great?
:{{DIcon}} Perhaps.
::'''Taher:''' I don't get what the point of selling this useless, gaudy stuff is. Maybe that's because I'm a bumpkin from the desert.
::'''Taher:''' Besides, these city folks doing business don't look too happy to me, either.
::'''Taher:''' Nine out of ten people who come out of the exchange look miserable, and the tenth will be bawling their eyes out.
::'''Taher:''' I also hear that there are students who think they can make it big by learning a few things. They come to try their luck, but end up forking over a year's worth of living expenses. Don't be like them!
:{{DIcon}} I'm not sure.
::'''Taher:''' Well, I'm not keen on trying to figure them out either.
{{Dialogue end}}
